Title: Relates to certification by pharmacists of patients using medical cannabis
Summary: Relates to the content and procedure for certification by pharmacists of patients using medical cannabis; allows a pharmacist employed by a registered organization and responsible for supervising the dispensing of medical cannabis within a cannabis dispensing facility to recommend and certify patients upon consultation within such dispensing facility.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to certification by pharmacists of patients using medical cannabis
